https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2r4WNCpwAQzekbaZwoCcOv1GJuO.jpg After Kunisada's Yakuza leader and father figure is brutally murdered, he and his best friend go on a two-man mission to avenge his death, killing other Yakuza leaders leading to a final confrontation by the old man's killers. Deadly Outlaw: Rekka
